text: (Isuramu no) sendatsu wa, dai 1 wa (makka kara no) sen'i-sha to,(sen'i-sha o mukae tasuketa madina no) enjo-sha to, yoi okonai o nashi, kare-ra ni shitagatta-sha-tachidearu. Arra wa kare-ra o mede rare, kare-ra mo mata kare ni man'etsu suru. Kare wa kawa ga shita o eien ni nagareru rakuen o, kare-ra no tame ni sonae, soko ni eien ni sumawase rareru. Sore wa shijo no kofuku no jojudearu
